# name

**Instance Property**

The name of a custom content world.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var name: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains a valid string only for content worlds you retrieve using the [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKContentWorld/world(name:)] function. The value of this property is `nil` for the content worlds in the [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKContentWorld/defaultClient] and [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKContentWorld/page] properties.

## Retrieving a Custom Content World

- **world(name:)**: Returns the custom content world with the specified name.

items.description: Returns the custom content world with the specified name.
items.name: world(name:)

title: name
